items.title: American Express Company: A Bull Case Theory
items.description: We came across a bullish thesis on American Express Company on Chit Chat Stocks Newsletter’s Substack by Brett Schafer. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AXP. American Express Company’s share was trading at $298.59 as of June 20th. AXP’s trailing and forward P/E ratios were 20.85 and 19.76, respectively, according to Yahoo Finance. […]
